channel.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
channel.description:
[code]So iv'e been making a bot for RS (I might release when done if its good) but in eclipse iv'e added many jar files to the compiler, but after compiler with eclipse I need to compile it again to put it into Powerbot... but thats when im getting errors. heres the compiler code.
[code@echo off
TITLE Compile-Scripts
"C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_05/bin/javac.exe" -cp ".;*.jar" ./src/*.java pause][/code]
But how would I get it to compile using methods from "Powerbot.jar" and "JFormDesigner.jar" ??

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

This isn’t the easy way out, its the better way out, using an IDE is cleaner anyways. There’s a difference between the right way, and just the stupid/longer choice. Why not move all the class files to the RSBot folder? Your going to just be Jarring it in the end anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

But then i wouldent now know how to compile with jar files… See i like to learn and not take the easy way out. the world needs more of those people

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Scyth_, post:6, topic:450870”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=553746.msg4057073#msg4057073 date=1343075654]
“but in eclipse iv’e added many jar files to the compiler, but after compiler with eclipse I need to compile it again to put it into Powerbot… but thats when im getting errors. heres the compiler code”

You don’t have to compile it again…
[/quote]

Eclipse compiles to the bin folder, but I compile it again into the RSbot folder[/quote]

You can change the build path, or even copy and paste it after it has been compiled…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:450870”]“but in eclipse iv’e added many jar files to the compiler, but after compiler with eclipse I need to compile it again to put it into Powerbot… but thats when im getting errors. heres the compiler code”

You don’t have to compile it again…[/quote]

Eclipse compiles to the bin folder, but I compile it again into the RSbot folder

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

“but in eclipse iv’e added many jar files to the compiler, but after compiler with eclipse I need to compile it again to put it into Powerbot… but thats when im getting errors. heres the compiler code”

You don’t have to compile it again…

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

why not just use makefile, ant or ide to do it for you…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:2, topic:450870”]using the classpath flag:

Windows:
[tt]java -cp “.;myJar.jar;myJar2.jar” myClass.java[/tt]

Unix:
[tt]java -cp ‘.:myJar.jar:myJar2.jar’ myClass.java[/tt][/quote]

although thats ‘java’ and not ‘javac’, thanks… But its not working for my second jar file. Im getting the import errors

EDIT: The jar file was running off other jar files, so i have to decompile, add some missing folders. and re jar the file… jesus…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling with multiple JAR files
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

using the classpath flag:

Windows:
[tt]java -cp “.;myJar.jar;myJar2.jar” myClass.java[/tt]

Unix:
[tt]java -cp ‘.:myJar.jar:myJar2.jar’ myClass.java[/tt]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[code]So iv’e been making a bot for RS (I might release when done if its good) but in eclipse iv’e added many jar files to the compiler, but after compiler with eclipse I need to compile it again to put it into Powerbot… but thats when im getting errors. heres the compiler code.

[code@echo off

TITLE Compile-Scripts

“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_05/bin/javac.exe” -cp ".;.jar" ./src/.java
pause][/code]
